thoughts.text: Greenheart Travel offers language camps, high school abroad programs, and teach English abroad programs. I should continue browsing the websites of the other top language schools to compare their programs and services and make an informed decision.
thoughts.reasoning: Comparing the services offered by different language schools will help me make an informed decision.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the 'browse_website' command to browse the websites of the other top language schools in the world
- Take notes on the programs that interest me
- Compare the options and decide on a course or destination to pursue first
thoughts.criticism: I need to make sure I am not getting overwhelmed by too many options and that I am making a decision in a timely manner.
